title: Fix systemd daemon service launch failures
description: Multiple critical issues: 1) PID file permission denied (/var/run needs root or use /run/user/1000), 2) Config path expansion doesn't work with tilde (~), 3) Service running as system service but needs user session access for Wayland/X11 and launching kitty terminal

title: Fix daemon to only kill screensaver kitty instance
description: Daemon kills ALL kitty sessions instead of just the screensaver instance. Need to track specific kitty PID or use unique window class/title to identify and terminate only the screensaver window.

title: Fix animation scaling to fill entire terminal window
description: Animation only displays in top-left corner instead of filling fullscreen terminal. Display binary needs to detect terminal size and scale/render animation to fill entire screen.
